```{r}
#| message: false
#| warning: false

library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
#| message: false
#| warning: false

x <- read_csv(file = "data/i_names.csv") |> 
  select(year, sex, name, prop) |> 
  mutate(prop = prop*1000000) |>
  filter(year >= 1900) |> 
  summarize(sum_prop = sum(prop), .by = c(year, sex))

x |> 
  ggplot(
    aes(x = year, fill = sum_prop, color = sex)
  )+
  geom_density()

```
